No wrapping elements:

|        |        |
| ------ | ------ |
| Cell 1 | Cell 2 |
| Cell 3 | Cell 4 |

No `thead`:

|        |        |
| ------ | ------ |
| Cell 1 | Cell 2 |
| Cell 3 | Cell 4 |

With align:

|        |        |
| :----- | -----: |
| Cell 1 | Cell 2 |
| Cell 3 | Cell 4 |

Here’s a Sudoku:

|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
| - | - | - | - | - | - | - | - | - |
| 1 |   | 3 | 6 |   | 4 | 7 |   | 9 |
|   | 2 |   |   | 9 |   |   | 1 |   |
| 7 |   |   |   |   |   |   |   | 6 |
| 2 |   | 4 |   | 3 |   | 9 |   | 8 |
|   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |
| 5 |   |   | 9 |   | 7 |   |   | 1 |
| 6 |   |   |   | 5 |   |   |   | 2 |
|   |   |   |   | 7 |   |   |   |   |
| 9 |   |   | 8 |   | 2 |   |   | 5 |

Here’s a table with a `thead` with *two* rows:

| Name           | Product               | Price              |
| -------------- | --------------------- | ------------------ |
| Your name here | What are you selling? | Your reserve price |
| Ms Danus       | Doughnuts             | $45                |
|                |                       |                    |
